api_list.name: Vehicle statistics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com/vehicle/hunter_f6"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com/vehicle/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vehicles statistics
User Invitations
api_list.description: Look squad invitations of specific user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com/Oxide/invitations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com/{username}/invitations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-thunder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: User vehicle statistics
api_list.description: Look vehicle statistics of specific user

required_parameters.name: role
required_parameters.description:
ROLE parameter depends on TYPE parameter.

Available roles for aviation:
all, other, bombers, fighters

Available roles for army:
all, other, spaa, destroyer, heavy, medium, light
